comments.comment:
From the "how's it going bros" to "can't wait to find out the gender"
Growing up with Pewds is an amazing journey.
Pewds could honestly have a lifestyle vlog for the rest of his life and the people will always watch. G- rated, wholesome, humor with a little bit of the fam..perfect.
Seeing Marzia and Pewds just live their life makes me so happy.

Each little part from Felix not being able to go into the hospital with Marzia, to all of the fun things they do together pulled at my heartstrings. Felix’s not just a great and entertaining vlogger, he’s also a terrific and dedicated husband. This kid is going to be so lucky to have him as their dad.

So grateful that Felix is still sharing his life with us. This is the most heartwarming arc of the last decade, and it's a joy to get witness the payoff of everything. Much love to Felix and Marzia as they enter this joyous time in their lives.

I love watching Pewds/Felix become like a dad with his personality. He’s matured a ton over the years. It’s also very gratifying to know that Felix and Marzia have maintained their relationship over the course of many years.
Seeing Felix and Marzia so happy about their life and their baby makes me cry tears of joy. Proud of you Pewdie
It warms my heart how they treat the doggies. They’re their children and Felix and Marzia always make sure to include and protect them
Watching these PewDiePie VLogs is like having the opportunity of watching the life of the main character of your favourite video game, AFTER the game is won. Just so wholesome

Love seeing this whole community collectively agree that this content is very wholesome and heartwarming as we’ve all grown up with pewds, especially when for so long people just wanted him to play happy wheels or amnesia.
Man, just watching this video makes me feel like my childhood has come to a conclusion. I've been watching Pewds since I was like 10. Now a new wave of people is spreading through the internet.
I’ve watched this man go from playing happy wheels and amnesia to just living in peace and vlogging his life. And I’m all for it and enjoy every second of it
The way they film and edit their vlog videos makes it feel like a 2000’s  home video. it feels nice to watch
Seeing these vlogs is like visiting old friends, after almost 12 years of watching you Felix, I’m just so happy you guys made it to Japan and that you guys are happy.
I can't lie, if we got a video like this once every couple months years from now after Pewds stops making vids, It would be wonderful
I feel whole-heartedly that Felix and Marzia are truly good people. Very few people I’ve met have that vibe of just “pure” and “genuine good” but that’s exactly what they have.
Watching pewds living his life to the fullest is just relaxing
This is pure serotonin. I've smiled through most of this video. Thanks for making these, Pewds.
Been watching pewds since I was 11, I’m now 22 and it puts a smile on my face that Felix is doing so well in life and he is happy. Keep rocking my man

don't forget to teach your kid Swedish, Italian and English
he or she will naturally learn Japanese in school and from tv/media
i grew up with 4 languages spoken around me and I've learned all of them
it was difficult for my parents to understand me at first, i started talking a little late and my sentences were a mix of all the languages I've been hearing, but eventually i learned to differentiate and it has given me a huge edge in life

The fact that almost a year since the last lockdowns fathers still aren’t allowed in the room when the mother finds out the gender of their baby is wild. Super cool seeing Felix and Marzia experiencing this regardless. I love the new style of vlogs, they’re so relaxing.

It's so cool to see this new Pewdiepie documenting his new life in Japan and i'm glad he's doing it because they're an inspiration to anyone, thank you Pewds for all these years of content, you deserve to rest and take care of your family
I love how Felix has grown with his audience and that's why he's still a hugely successful youtuber.

These videos are like what happens after 'And they lived happily ever after'
Like an epilogue of a great book in a way
I feel so blessed to have the chance to see Felix in his Dad phase

I still can't believe I watched your channel all throughout my schooling years and around a decade later, all your hard work has finally paid off. A family, a new life in Japan, everything you could ever want. You deserve everything, Pewds and Marzia <3 Congratulations, thanks for bringing us all so much fun and cheer over the years :')

It's so lovely to see even after all the change that's happened on YouTube,  you've always managed to be so happy. The vlogs make me emotional af

This was amazing to see - Realizing your dream of moving to Japan with the woman you have always loved, your first child on the way - and sharing some of the highlights with us.  I like that you creatively worked around sticking the camera in Marzia's face and let her just enjoy her day with you, vs having to smile for the camera the whole time.  I feel happy and proud of you.  I'm so happy that you have naturally matured into a really good man.  And your entertainment / content has evolved really well.  Cheers!!
I was 16 when I first watched Felix's vids. I'm 28 now with a happy, healthy 11 month old daughter. It's so nice to see him starting his own family and enjoying life!
Papa Pewds and Mama Marzia,  Thank you both for continuing to share your life with us.  Seeing you both so happy brings all of us happiness.
You can tell Felix's already  a good dad the way he raised edgar and Maya ️
Man watching the part where they go sledding made me tear up. I'm basically witnessing someone live their best life with the person they love most its so beautiful.
This is the cutest video I’ve ever seen, it’s wild. I’ve been watching since around 2014 and witnessing the transition from gaming, to reactions, and now family content makes me want to tear up.
13:35 SHE DID THE PEWDIEPIE FACE
everytime pewds post, it always feels like some sort of reunion. im reminded of how long i’ve been watching him and it makes me feel warm inside, im so so happy for the both of you!

This video is really inspiring me to get off my ass and work hard for the things I want in life. What I’d give to retire in a new country knowing I’m financially stable, to start a family etc. I’m so happy for Felix, I started watching him when I was like 10-11 years old (maybe younger but I don’t wanna do the math lmao) and I’m gonna be 23 this year. I love that he’s living his life the way he wants to now. That’s it, I’m going for my goals
Your vlogs always bring a comfort to me.  Seeing you and Marzia so happy is just so infectious that it's hard not to be happy for you guys

Life has been very unkind to me lately but every one of these vlogs makes my heart soar. Watching Felix and Marzia so happy leaves a tiny piece of that in my own heart. I've grown up watching Felix, to see him so content makes me feel so warm inside.

Watching Felix's videos is like catching up with an old friend. I may not watch every single time something is uploaded but I go back to it and enjoy them all the same when the mood strikes. Kind of like a friend you don't talk to everyday but you know they'll be there when you shoot a text.
Damn pewds ngl watching you happy feels extremely personal to me man, I feel so happy myself watching you happy. Love you pewds, and thanks for all these years and coming!
Felix and Marzia still documenting and sharing their life with us.. eternally grateful
The man who was screaming in amnesia and other stuff is now a dad and is living the best of his life. Makes my heart warm.
Crazy to think that I’ve seen these two go from dating, to being husband and wife, to now being parents. Insane how far they’ve come ️
Pewds and Marzia’s relationship and just life is goals. Goals goals goals.

7:15 Japanese: "Nice sky"
Felix: You too
Seeing you and Marzia so happy is just so infectious that it's hard not to be happy for you guys
Felix is finally enjoying every facet of retired life after years of tirelessly entertaining us. He and Marzia deserves this :)

Why am I crying seeing Edgar? I remember when he looked so young, and now he looks so grown
I wish many more years for him with pewds, marzia, momo and baby
I can’t wait for their child to look at their vlogs someday and say “wow, my parents loved each other very much and still do to this day”. Congrats to you both, Felix and Marzia! ️
This is like watching an anime or tv series except they actually let you see the happy ending after the adventure instead of just implying what happened. Its nice

I think we're entering a new era of youtube and it's giving me a lot of hope. Of course pewds doesn't dictate the trajectory of the entire platform, but many events included it feels like we're entering one of the special periods. The ones you look back on as "the good times".

This is equal to seeing Ash Ketchups journey coming to an end it's bitter sweet seeing pewds going from a guy that plays COD to Amnesia, playing all these horror games to now the journey that this man has come was just bittersweet and to see him becoming a dad is just so wholesome happy for you pewds and blessings to everyone.
3:26 Edgar do look like that wise old monk in the mountains in a anime
Why does pewds current content like this just make me feel like its just family VHS footage, i love it so much
What a man. So good seeing Felix living his best life.

i love watching felix as i grow with him as a person. hes even introduced me to multiple philosophies that greatly aid me in my life. even through the ups and downs he still manages to grow and that should be an inspiration to anyone. im sure pewds’ baby will be happy to know how many people love and support their family and felix will be such an amazing cool father.
Seeing Marzia pregnant is really exciting

I hope that everyone gets to experience this genuine love and happiness that Felix and Marzia experience everyday. Seeing them so happy is just so contagious,and I can't help but feel really proud and really happy for them.  They are such kind and awesome people,and I feel like they will be great parents. I hope for the best for them,as well for everyone in here.
Momo sounds like a gremlin when that leash was being taken off
We've all grown up with Pewd's throughout the years and to now see him about to be a dad feels surreal. Congratulations Felix and Marzia!
I'm literally crying. I've been watching Pewds since a bit before the Amnesia era, and now this is the first video that I watch with my son. Time really flies

I've been watching your videos since 2012 and it's been a treat watching you grow and progress from the guy who screamed at Amnesia monsters and Stephano statues, to the man who's vibing in Japan and starting his family. Thank you for allowing us on your journey throughout these years, I wish you and your family love and good health
I just know they’re gonna be such good parents I’m so happy for both of them
god im so happy to see pewds peacefully living his life with his wife...
5:51 even after all these years he still cals us gamers
Overwhelmed by the wholesomeness and cuteness of this whole video. So happy for Pewds
111 million subscribers later, still super down to earth. Lovely tuning into one of these vlogs every once in a while
Seeing both of them so much in love with each other, being the best of friends and just going about their lives makes my heart feel so warm
This was so cute. I needed this for my bad week. So happy Felix and marzia are living their best lives. Can't wait for you two to be the best parents ever!

That giggle at 4:07 is all we needed.

Put a smile on millions of faces
I love how while Momo is having a temper tantrum, Marzia patiently and gently removes the leash. She's going to be a great mom
I am so happy for both of you! These vlogs feel like gettings letters from old friends, telling us about life and the happy memories they are making. Thank you for sharing them Felix and Marzia!
Felix went from "AGHHHHH HORROR GAMES!!!" to "here's my cute little doggies and my beautiful pregnant wife"
That little "Thank you for your kindness, sir!" after he gave her the tiniest bit of canned bread cracked me up. Amazing video as always!~

I love the feeling & atmosphere of the Japan videos.  They're so relaxing and it looks like exactly what Pewds & Marzia needed.  They quite honestly renew my faith in humanity a little bit more and more.

These videos are beautiful. Being able to see a glimpse into Felix and Marzia’s life brings me so much joy, makes me so happy for the amazing family they’re building 🫶

I wish them nothing but the best <3
Respect to marzia for editing these videos while she's pregnant she must be feeling really exhausted so huge props to marzia
Everytime felix uploads its like an escape into a perfect reality for 15-20min. He's living the dream life
Ever since they moved to JP, every time I watch Pewds vids inspire me to work hard, love my wife, and care for my pets. It's just too wholesome...

You got so much air on that tube jump! That looked like so much fun! I'm so happy for you and Marzia that you've found your peace and your true home. I hope all the grace and kind spirit you two have is passed on to your little one. I am so excited to see your family grow. I've been watching you for years Felix, and it's been a pleasure!

These vlogs are so calming, i really like that Felix is filming his life in Japan with Marzia. These videos are going to be the ones we look back to in 5 years and think how grateful we are for these memories with Felix! Congratulations for your baby with Marzia too!

The change of content let’s you see how pewds grew as a person and it makes me really happy being able to see tho because it is as if we were able to have a peek at how life it’s been, it almost feels as if we were part of it too

I remembered i started wathcing felix when i was 6 years old which is 7 years ago. And now im 13. Im so happy being able to see felix starting a family. From being a gamer to becoming a dad. Im sooo excited to see your baby. Its sooo wholesome seeing felix with marzia starting a family.
Felix had built one interesting legacy, and I wish him and his soon to grow family the best.
He’s done so much for us in the YouTube community. He deserves a good life away making videos when he can. He’s worked for a long time. He deserves the rest.
17:19 I was hoping it was eternals too so excited

As much as i miss laughing until i cried at his older videos, i hope that my future will be as fulfilling and joyous as these videos, i grew up watching Pewds and im glad i get to see him enjoying his life with his family
The comment section has grown so much over the years along with the channels, everyone is just appreciating this new era of pewdiepie and the place is filled with wholesome people.
Pewds is starting to look more and more like his own dad now, shows how much he matured, and ofc we matured with him

With this video, Pewds has officially transitioned into Dad YouTube and it’s the best
Peaceful and wholesome vibes all around 11:17

man, i remember watching pewds play things like grave, swamp simulator, the forest, goat simulator, things like that, and now he's an effing father. he is literally going to be a dad to one of the most beautiful babies in the world. marzia and felix are so lucky. 

i cannot believe it's been this crazy of a journey. i'm so lucky to be a subscriber and follow this journey with him and marzia, and i'm so thankful to be witnessing the start of the new stage of life.

I'm getting emotional watching this. I started watching Pewdiepie when I was 12. I'm 28 now. I remember when he first talked about Marzia on his channel when the video quality was like 240p lol and now they're married and expecting a baby. I remember when Edgar first made it on camera. Now his face is frosted and he wear little pee wraps. Adorable. and Now there's a new pug puppy... My heart man <3

I really really want to see the nursery… can you IMAGINE how cute that room will be with how creative Marzia is!!! ️ I miss her YT videos for that reason ️ is there any chance Marzia can hijack the Pewdiepie channel for a video for a Nursery Inspo Vid

Several years ago, we were seeing a YouTuber playing horror games but now we're seeing a father making vlogs in Japan. 

Time flies so fast.
I love how this is like the story after the main character beat the villain and it just continues in their peaceful life.
This comment is unoriginal. Cry in the replies.
Happy for Pewds and Marzia, they'll be great parents.

Watching the little family they’re making and catching little snippets of the life they’re loving in Japan makes my heart feel so warm and happy. I just wish the best for them in the future and hope they hold on to as much of this happiness as possible forever ️

That genuine "hehehe" when he pet the dogs got me 
Thanks for more relaxing and chill vlogs! It's nice to see you two enjoying yourselves even in super cold weather, the fun feeling is contagious (not that we have winter here so idk how it feels lol). I also appreciate the scenery shots and the cityscapes as always
13:00 is the cutest thing I have ever seen
I love that he still shares parts of his life with us, such a beautiful thing
Seeing them together makes me sooo happy! I wish I had someone to share all those moments with too! I feel so warm inside to see them happy together, soon to be parents!
i envy Felix so much for where he lives.  Ive always wanted to get properly set up in Japan.  Been to Tokyo twice in my life for about a month each time and I miss it so much.
these two have always been my favourite couple, the happiness is contagious and it gives me faith that one day i may find something as special as this

Your 3D print wasn't dumb. 3D printing is perfect for shit like that. I do it all the time. Custom parts that improve or fix your existing stuff is what it's all about. My ratio of printing tools/functional pieces to art/toys is at least 10:1. Cool to see that you've gotten into it. I expect these things to become like a regular household appliance around 2030. They're getting to be much easier and faster to use with consistent results.
Sometimes I tear up a little seeing these two. I love seeing our boy and his queen flourishing.

I started watching Pewds when I was 15 years old. Now I'm 26, and last couple of Pewds' videos are the most wholesome, relaxing and full of pure joy. I can't wait to see them again, just enjoying their lifes. Happy to have you Felix, when you were playing Happy Wheels as well as vlogging in Japan, you are making a lot for us these years. I'm very proud to be part of this community ️

I am so happy for you guys. Being pregnant was the happiest I have ever been in my life, and giving birth to my child was the best thing to ever happen to me. I am so happy that the two of you get to experience this together! Enjoy every moment! ️️️
I’m so proud of both of them. Seeing them live their best lives.
I love these types of videos. I’m really happy to see your whole evolution on youtube.
These vloggs are like the coziest thing ever, I love them so much! Thank you Felix, Marzia, Edgar and Momo ️
5:33 my heart melted. love the video, it looks so warm  hope you're all doing well always!
Papa Felix and Mama Marzia  these videos are definitely going to be cherished by your kids and all us fans for years to come.

Highlight of my month every time Pewds. 
I know you're humble about it, but I really do hope to live a life like this with someone I love dearly someday, just as you are. I know nothing is all as perfect as a vlog can make it seem, but its the imperfections in anyone's day that make it that much better to spend moments like these with a little family you're building. Keep living your best life <3
I love these vlogs so much! Just seeing Felix and Marzia living their lives and making memories is so fulfilling to me <3
To hear your laughter makes all the struggles in the world worth it. May you always have moments of happiness and unbridled joy, Felix and Marzia (and Edgar and Momo as well). ️️

I love these blogs so much.  They hit on so many levels.  I get to explore and discover Japan with Pewds and Marzia’s in their new life.  These are super fun and relaxing at the same time.  The editing is amazing as well.  I love the retro nostalgic vibe going on with it with the VCR overlay, and the music is super relaxing.

How time flies. My brother and I used to watch you in school. Over the years I lost him to cancer and I alone have grow up. I went to college and moved to a different city. I met my life partner and got married. And I still get to come back here and connect to my childhood. I miss my brother and watching your videos makes me think about how much time has passed and how in the moment I am still the same little girl giggling at a PewDiePie video.

it's like watching your best friend go out and succeed, moce on and move up, it makes me so happy. thank you pewds for all you've done for us and thank you for letting us see you start the most beautiful journey my man!

Love to see Pewds succeeding. Am currently half his age and always wondered how he could make people happy and forget their problems, but I just realised watching this during the hardest times of my life when I was hospitalised cause of a pelvic injury and now that am starting a career in the military I always come back to Felix for a little bit of happiness, thanks for the content and being an older brother Felix, keep winning.
